title: Regulation (EEC) No 2468/72 of the Commission of 24 November 1972 determining collection, processing and storage centres for intervention on the market in raw tobacco
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2468/72 OF THE COMMISSION of 24 November 1972 determining collection, processing and storage centres for intervention on the market in raw tobacco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The collection centres and the processing and storage centres referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 1467/70 shall be as set out in the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 November 1972.
